snippet: Rory McIlroy was voted the PGA Tour player of the year after winning four events, including the P.G.A. Championship.
abstract: Rory McIlroy is voted PGA Tour player of the year and John Huh is voted rookie of the year.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy was voted the PGA Tour player of the year after winning four events, including the P.G.A. Championship.

headline.main: McIlroy Voted Player of the Year
